headline: Sion Swifts win seven-goal thriller to lead NIWFA Championship
summary: Sion Swifts are new leaders in the NIWFA Championship, recovering from two goals down to win 4-3 at Bangor. Lydia Clarke and Amanda Morton fired the Seasiders into the two-goal lead but Rachel Barnaby calmly […]

headline: Glentoran abruptly end Lisburn Rangers’ perfect Women’s Premiership form
summary: Glentoran and Cliftonville maintained their perfect start to the Sports Direct Women’s Premiership with a fifth straight victory each. Friday evening’s other fixture was a draw between Derry City and Larne, while Linfield welcome Wexford […]

headline: West Ham Women’s Kirsty Smith signs contract extension
summary: West Ham United’s Scotland international full-back Kirsty Smith has signed a contract extension with the Hammers. Smith told West Ham TV: “I’ve had two great years at the club and I’m really happy to be continuing […]

headline: Women’s & girls’ open training / trials – Summer 2024

headline: Leicester City Women’s duo stay while six go
summary: Leicester City midfielder Janice Cayman and defender Sophie Howard have signed new contracts while half-a-dozen players have departed the club. Scotland international Howard has made more than 100 appearances for the Foxes, while Cayman is […]

headline: Former Arsenal Women’s boss takes charge at Lyon
summary: Joe Montemurro has been appointed the new manager of Lyon, filling the vacancy left by Sonia Bompastor’s departure to Chelsea. Montemurro won the WSL title and Conti Cup with Arsenal, while recently leading Australia’s A-League […]

headline: West Ham Women’s Viviane Asseyi signs contract extension
summary: West Ham United’s 30-year-old French international forward Viviane Asseyi has signed a contract extension with the club. She joined the Hammers in 2022 and since then has missed just one of the team’s 56 fixtures […]

headline: Ellie Roebuck joins Champions League winners
summary: Goalkeeper Ellie Roebuck signs for UEFA Women’s Champions League holders Barcelona after leaving Manchester City. The 24-year-old England international has joined Barca on a contract covering the next two seasons, after missing all the 2023/24 […]

headline: She Kicks Issue 85
summary: What a time to be alive…it’s SK85! The summer edition of your women’s football magazine is locked and loaded. Here’s a sneak peek at what you can look forward to losing yourself in… One-on-one with […]

headline: Four Highlands and Islands teams win £1,000 from ScottishPower
summary: Caithness WFC, Buckie Ladies, Brora Rangers and Shetland Girls have each been awarded £1,000 in a ScottishPower funding competition. Launched specifically for clubs across the Highlands & Islands, as part of ScottishPower becoming the first […]
